official_title: Wearable Device Intervention to Improve Sun Behaviors in Melanoma Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* 18-75 years old
* Diagnosed with cutaneous invasive melanoma within HealthPartners system
* Able to read/write in English
* Own a smartphone
* Able to provide voluntary informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Patients who have opted out of their records being used for research purposes
* Inability to provide informed written consent
* Pregnancy
